name: Creamy Ham and Cheese Quiche
author: Lindsey Elizabeth
summary: This quiche is creamy, simple, and delicious!
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) pastry for a 9-inch pie crust
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Press pie pasty into the bottom of a 9-inch pie plate
Bake pie crust in preheated oven for 5 minutes, use a fork to poke holes into the crust, and continue cooking until lightly browned, about 5 minutes more
Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese, Swiss cheese, and 1 tablespoon flour in a bowl; spread over the warm pie crust
Stir ham and honey mustard together in a bowl to coat the ham completely; spoon over the cheese mixture
Mix half-and-half, eggs, green onions, 1 tablespoon flour, and salt together in bowl
Pour mixture carefully over the ham layer; top with remaining Cheddar cheese
Bake in preheated oven until set in the center, 40 to 50 minutes
